article: Welcome to Class Four, Grade Seven. This is our  _  . There are sixty-four desks and  chairs  in the classroom. Thirty-two of them are  _  boys and thirty-two of them are for girls. There is a teacher's desk  in front of  all the students' desks and chairs. It's big and clean. It's for our teachers. There are two big  _  on the wall.  _  is on the front wall and the other is on the back wall. Teachers and students can write things on them. There are two maps on the wall, too. One is a map  _  China and the other is a map of the  _  . We can find many countries in it. There are some  _  about our school life on the wall, too. They are  next to  the world map. There are some flowers by the windows. What a beautiful classroom it is! We all like it.
